Introduction to R and Python for Data Analysis

This series of blog posts introduces you to programming for data analysis. Learn how to read, visualize, and wrangle data with R and Python.


Google Maps image of Interstate-80 (I-80) Freeway Segment.
This series uses the I-80 dataset from NGSIM project.
